verbs.description: Under Donald Trump ’s leadership , Republicans [V: have] reached the pinnacle of fecklessness : they are the party of non - responsibility . The buck always stops with someone else — preferably Barack Obama . But the media , law enforcement ... really anything else ...

[ARGM-LOC: Under Donald Trump ’s leadership] , [ARG0: Republicans] have [V: reached] [ARG1: the pinnacle of fecklessness] : they are the party of non - responsibility . The buck always stops with someone else — preferably Barack Obama . But the media , law enforcement ... really anything else ...

Under Donald Trump ’s leadership , Republicans have reached the pinnacle of fecklessness : [ARG1: they] [V: are] [ARG2: the party of non - responsibility] . The buck always stops with someone else — preferably Barack Obama . But the media , law enforcement ... really anything else ...

Under Donald Trump ’s leadership , Republicans have reached the pinnacle of fecklessness : they are the party of non - responsibility . [ARG1: The buck] [ARGM-TMP: always] [V: stops] [ARG2: with someone else — preferably Barack Obama . But the media , law enforcement ... really anything else] ...
